arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ وَفِّرْ حَظِّيْ فِيْهِ مِنَ النَّوَافِلِ
وَقَرِّبْ فِيْهِ وَسِيْلَتِيْ إِلَيْكَ مِنْ بَيْنِ الوَسَائِلِ
يَا مَنْ لَا يَشْغَلُهُ إِلْحَاحُ المُلِحّينَ
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah: on this day, decide for me a share of the supererogatory acts,
And honor me by making me care for its matters,
And make near my means to You from among the other means;
O He Whom is not preoccupied by the earnest entreaty of the insisters.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhumma waffir ḥaẓẓī fīhi minan nawāfil
waqarrib fīhi wasīlatī ilayka min baynil wasā-il
yā man lā yashghaluhu ilḥāḥul muliḥḥin
